name: Google Sheets Integration
description: Read and write Google Sheets for data analysis and reporting

GOOGLE_SHEETS_CREDENTIALS.description: Google Service Account credentials JSON (base64 encoded)
GOOGLE_SHEETS_CREDENTIALS.help: Get from Google Cloud Console → APIs & Services → Credentials

GOOGLE_SHEETS_TOKEN.description: OAuth2 refresh token (alternative to service account)
GOOGLE_SHEETS_TOKEN.help: Use either service account credentials OR refresh token

DEFAULT_SPREADSHEET_ID.description: Default Google Sheets ID to work with
DEFAULT_SPREADSHEET_ID.help: Found in the Sheet URL: docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{ID}/edit
